Uses of Package
nl.esciencecenter.esight.math

  • Packages that use nl.esciencecenter.esight.math 
    Package Description
    nl.esciencecenter.esight
    This package contains the most important classes for the eSight Library and is the root package for all the other eSight packages except for the example implementation.
    nl.esciencecenter.esight.experimental
    This package is more of a storage area for currently unused classes that are highly experimental and probably buggy.
    nl.esciencecenter.esight.input
    The user-input centered classes of the library.
    nl.esciencecenter.esight.math
    The matrix/vector math library needed for OpenGL 3.0+ functionality.
    nl.esciencecenter.esight.models
    Simple geometric models for use by the library.
    nl.esciencecenter.esight.scenegraph
    Scenegraph functionality implementation, including an octree datastructure.
    nl.esciencecenter.esight.shaders
    GLSL Shader wrapper packages for Object-Oriented shader-enabled programming.
    nl.esciencecenter.esight.text
    Package containing the classes needed to implement 3d and 2d text in jogl.
  • Classes in nl.esciencecenter.esight.math used by nl.esciencecenter.esight 
    Class and Description
    MatF4
    4x4 float matrix implementation
  • Classes in nl.esciencecenter.esight.math used by nl.esciencecenter.esight.experimental 
    Class and Description
    MatF4
    4x4 float matrix implementation
    VecF2
    A 2-place float vector implementation.
    VecF3
    A 3-place float vector implementation
    VecF4
    A 4-place float vector implementation.
  • Classes in nl.esciencecenter.esight.math used by nl.esciencecenter.esight.input 
    Class and Description
    VecF3
    A 3-place float vector implementation
  • Classes in nl.esciencecenter.esight.math used by nl.esciencecenter.esight.math 
    Class and Description
    Color4
    More specific implementation of a color VecF4.
    MatF2
    2x2 float matrix implementation.
    MatF3
    3x3 float matrix implementation
    MatF4
    4x4 float matrix implementation
    MatrixF
    Abstract class for all Matrices that provides several utility functions.
    VecF2
    A 2-place float vector implementation.
    VecF3
    A 3-place float vector implementation
    VecF4
    A 4-place float vector implementation.
    VecS2
    A 2-place short integer vector implementation.
    VecS3
    A 3-place short integer vector implementation.
    VecS4
    A 4-place short integer vector implementation.
    Vector
    Generic abstract type for all vector implementaions.
    Vector.Type 
    VectorF
    Generic abstract type for all float vector implementations.
    VectorS
    Generic short integer abstract Vector type.
